job_tasks.phrase: Design, implement and maintain reliable, scalable and efficient backend services for DeepL's Document Translation service, including the Glossaries feature
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly describes the core activities of software development, focusing on building and maintaining backend services, which are user-facing or support user-facing applications.

job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to monitoring and debugging the services in production, e.g. by defining expressive metrics and ensuring expressive logs
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring and debugging services in production, including defining metrics and ensuring proper logging, are key aspects of operations engineering and MLOps.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate across teams to define shared interfaces and ensure smooth operation in production
job_tasks.justification: Collaborating across teams to define interfaces and ensure smooth operation implies understanding how different parts of the business interact and ensuring technical solutions align with overall operational goals.

job_tasks.phrase: monthly full-day hacking sessions: every month, we have Hack Fridays, where you can spend your time diving into a project you're passionate about and get the opportunity to work with other teams-we value your initiatives, impact, and creativity.
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'Hack Fridays' and valuing 'initiatives, impact, and creativity' directly points towards a culture that encourages innovation and ownership.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate across teams to define shared interfaces and ensure smooth operation in production
job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Collaborate across teams' explicitly indicates a need for strong communication and teamwork.

job_tasks.phrase: Open communication, regular feedback: as a language-focused company, we value the importance of clear, honest communication. We value smooth collaboration, direct and actionable feedback, and believe that leading with empathy makes us better together.
job_tasks.justification: This entire section highlights the importance of open communication, feedback, and collaboration, aligning with the 'Communication & Collaboration' soft skill.

job_tasks.phrase: Annual learning budget: because we never stop learning, we've set up an annual budget for your professional development-pick a learning path which contributes to your career development and we'll back you up.
job_tasks.justification: The provision of an annual learning budget and the statement 'because we never stop learning' directly reflects a commitment to continuous learning and professional development.

soft_skills.phrase: Collaborate across teams to define shared interfaces and ensure smooth operation in production

Open communication, regular feedback: as a language-focused company, we value the importance of clear, honest communication. We value smooth collaboration, direct and actionable feedback, and believe that leading with empathy makes us better together.

Annual learning budget: because we never stop learning, we've set up an annual budget for your professional development-pick a learning path which contributes to your career development and we'll back you up.

monthly full-day hacking sessions: every month, we have Hack Fridays, where you can spend your time diving into a project you're passionate about and get the opportunity to work with other teams-we value your initiatives, impact, and creativity.

classification.rationale: The job description focuses heavily on traditional backend software development, operations, and collaboration. There is no explicit mention of Generative AI models, LLMs, RAG, fine-tuning, or related generative technologies. Therefore, it does not fit the GenAI Engineer profile.
